questions.question: What is this platform for?
questions.answer: Our platform provides PG recommendations to students and connects them directly with landlords.

questions.question: Who developed this platform?
questions.answer: This platform is developed by Pranav,Shriniwas,Prajyot and Abhishek

questions.question: Can students communicate with landlords directly through your platform?
questions.answer: Yes.

questions.question: Can students search for PG accommodations based on specific preferences on your platform?
questions.answer: Yes!you can search on specific perferences on the platform.

questions.question: How do students communicate with landlords on your platform?
questions.answer: Students can directly contact landlords using their phone numbers.

questions.question: Do you provide Wi-Fi facility?
questions.answer: Yes, Wi-Fi facility is available for all guests.

questions.question: What information do you provide about each PG accommodation listed on your platform?
questions.answer: We only provide Address,phoneNumber.

questions.question: How can guests check the availability of rooms?
questions.answer: Guests can check room availability by visiting our website or contacting our customer service.

questions.question: Can students receive notifications or alerts about new PG listings that match their criteria?
questions.answer: No.

questions.question: Do you provide housekeeping services?
questions.answer: Yes, housekeeping services are provided [frequency].

questions.question: Is there a curfew or time restriction for guests?
questions.answer: No, there is no curfew or time restriction for guests.

questions.question: Are pets allowed in the accommodation?
questions.answer: Pets are not allowed in the accommodation.

questions.question: Are there any additional charges or taxes?
questions.answer: Additional charges or taxes may apply. Please refer to our pricing policy for details.

questions.question: Do you provide parking facilities?
questions.answer: Yes, parking facilities are available for guests.

questions.question: Is there a security deposit required?
questions.answer: Yes, a security deposit is required upon check-in.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept payment by credit card, debit card, PayPal, and cash.

questions.question: Is there an age restriction for guests?
questions.answer: Yes, guests must be at least [18] years old to stay in our accommodation.

questions.question: Are there any rules regarding noise levels?
questions.answer: Yes, guests are expected to keep noise levels to a minimum, especially during quiet hours.

questions.question: Is there a security presence on the premises?
questions.answer: Yes, we have security personnel on-site to ensure the safety of our guests.

questions.question: Is there good connectivity for transportation, restaurants, colleges, and industries?
questions.answer: Yes, we ensure good connectivity for transportation, restaurants, colleges, and industries.
